##################################################################
### Terrain Categories
###
###

#Reorganised by Draiocht
#First flat lands, Farmland-Grassland-Dryland-Steppe
#Then normal types, Woods-Forest-Coastline-Marsh
#Then hilly types, Hills-Highlands-Mountains
#Then exotic types, Savannah-Jungle-Desert-Coastal Desert-Glacial
#Other unused types at the bottom, except pti, which I dont want to mess with because I have no idea what it is for
#Also organised modifers into Colour-Sound-Supply-Movement Cost-Development Cost-Allowed Buildings-ND Cost-Defense-Defensiveness

categories =  {
	pti = {
		type = pti
	}
	
	farmlands = {
		color = { 179 255 64 }
		type = plains
		sound_type = plains

		supply_limit = 6
		movement_cost = 1.0			#vanilla 1.10
		local_development_cost = -0.10
		allowed_num_of_buildings = 2
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 1.10
		local_build_time = -0.25			#Flat land, good soil, mild weather
		local_build_cost = -0.1			#Plenty of people, easy access to trade routes for building supplies, established quarries, good infrastructure
		local_production_efficiency = 0.05	#Much more productive lands compared to other terrain types

		terrain_override = {
			#Unaltered Vanilla
			259 558 2060 2063 2075 872 2380 4384 2141 2144 2979 4196 7541

	alluvial_plains = {
		color = { 218 253 77 }
		type = plains
		sound_type = plains

		supply_limit = 6
		movement_cost = 1.0			#vanilla 1.10
		local_development_cost = -0.05

		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 1.1
		local_build_time = -0.2			#Flat land, fertile soil, mild weather
		local_manpower_modifier = 0.05
		local_production_efficiency = 0.05	#Floodplains,
		trade_goods_size_modifier = 0.05	#Very good terrain for farm production
		
		terrain_override = {

	drylands = {
		color = { 232 172 102 }
		type = plains
		sound_type = plains

		supply_limit = 3
		movement_cost = 1.00			#vanilla 1.00
		local_development_cost = 0.25
		allowed_num_of_buildings = 2
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 0.95
		local_build_time = -0.25			#Flat land, hard soil
		local_build_cost = 0.1			#Few trees for building materials, alternate building materials take more time to gather, lower pop density for labour

		terrain_override = {
			
			#Beyond Typus
			357 4324 5249 2216 2802 6629 8070 786 6606 6955 6958 1233 2318 5273 4553 781 2868 2213 4337 2207 4304 2205 2333 5250 2320 5226 348 5061 2751 8049 2755 4552 3099 8059 8055 8072 4335 2954 2867 2863 2870 780 878 2493 875 2666 4314 8076 6526 6530 6549 6605 6609 6138 6145 6147

	mediterranean_grasslands = {
		color = { 175 182 199 }
		type = plains
		sound_type = plains

		supply_limit = 4			#Better than drylands
		movement_cost = 1.1
		local_development_cost = 0.1		#Warm climate, hot summers, evergreen plants with hard leaves, 10% seems alright
		allowed_num_of_buildings = 2
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 0.95
		defence = 1
		local_build_time = -0.1			#Semi-flat land, hard soil and not much land clearing needed
		local_build_cost = 0.05			#Some trees for building materials, alternate building materials like stone take more time to gather

		terrain_override = {
			222 1179 1181 2856 3982 3994 3995 4737 5131 5340 5343 5350 5352 5353 5357 5370 5430 5560 6547 7145 7358 7726 7763 8610
			
			#VU - Vermalha Addition
			3991
		}
	}

		supply_limit = 2
		movement_cost = 1.50			#vanilla 1.3
		local_development_cost = 0.40
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 0.90
		defence = 2
		local_defensiveness = 0.2
		local_build_time = 0.25			#Difficult soil requires special construction and safeguards against flooding, sinking, and rotting
		local_build_cost = 0.25			#Low quality construction supplies, extra care must be taken and extra rot/sink/flood-proof foundations built

		terrain_override = {
			#Unaltered Vanilla

	salt_flats = {
		color = { 245 245 230 }
		type = desert
		sound_type = desert
	
		supply_limit = 0
		attrition = 4
		movement_cost = 1.0			#Actually easy to move on
		local_development_cost = 0.9
		allowed_num_of_buildings = -2
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 0.8
		local_build_time = 0.4			#Ever try building on salt wasteland... it isn't easy but at least terrain is flat
		local_build_cost = 0.50			#All materials need to be imported, no labour pools to draw upon
		local_manpower_modifier = -0.2		#Extreme conditions actively against population growth, no food and easy to die here
		local_defensiveness = -0.1		#I'd say that completely flat, open terrain opposed defensive efforts in this instance
		
		terrain_override = {
			4506 8410			#White desert of Kutch
			5389 5391 5399 5402 5423	#South Africa
			5316 5329 			#Chott El-Djerid
			2230 6132 6143 8404		#Kavir & Persia
			4274				#Arabia
			2370				#Central Asia
			6183 6197 6998			#Australia
			2946				#Andes
			2619				#Mexico
			4967 5770 5772 5822 5840	#North America
			5303				#Giarabub
			2123 2191			#Gobi
		}	
	}
	
	desert_ranges = {
		color = { 235 109 56 }
		type = desert
		sound_type = desert
		supply_limit = 0
		movement_cost = 1.75
		local_development_cost = 0.9
		allowed_num_of_buildings = -2
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 0.8
		defence = 4
		attrition = 3
		local_defensiveness = 0.50		#Desert mountains, same as mountains + harsh desert conditions
		local_build_time = 0.5			#Try to combine deserted ground and uneven mountainous terrain
		local_build_cost = 0.4			#All materials need to be importend, requires constant supply lines, no native labors to use + extreme conditions
		local_manpower_modifier = -0.1		#Conditions actively against population growth, scarse food and easy to die here
		
		terrain_override = {
			349 350 351 391 403 434 436 576 2182 2219 2232 2233 2235 2330 2343 2345 2450 2458 2460 2463 2464 2466 2474 4277 4282 4284 4287 4326 4327 4345 5220 5228 5231 5232 5235 5243 5246 5280 5282 5307 5181 5309 5310 5324 5328 5348 5552 6129 6130 6505 6550 6607 6672 6952 6959 7450 8407
		}
	}
	
	dry_highlands = {
		color = { 230 135 135 }
		type = hills
		sound_type = plains

		supply_limit = 2
		movement_cost = 1.5		#vanilla 1.00
		local_development_cost = 0.4	#Same as hills due to climate and uneven terrain
		allowed_num_of_buildings = 1
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 0.9
		defence = 2
		local_defensiveness = 0.175		#Defensive positions on high ground, though not as great at hills covered in forest
		local_build_time = 0.05			#Uneven land but hard soil
		local_build_cost = 0.15			#Few trees for building materials, alternate building materials take more time to gather, lower pop density for labour

		terrain_override = {
			352 353 399 405 569 699 702 774 1099 1210 1216 1220 1229 2115 2215 2274 2305 2321 2327 2328 2344 2346 2454 2765 2789 2790 3038 3095 3967 3985 4060 4171 4269 4271

		type = marsh
		sound_type = desert

		attrition = 1
		movement_cost = 1.3			#Not as bad to move through due to flat and mostly open terrain
		local_development_cost = 0.75
		allowed_num_of_buildings = -1
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 0.8
		attrition = 2
		local_build_time = 0.4			#Building in tundra is rather slow
		local_build_cost = 0.25			#While not as expensive as glacier, it still requires moderate effort

	glacier = {
		color = { 235 235 235 }
		sound_type = desert

		supply_limit = 0
		attrition = 4
		movement_cost = 2.0			#vanilla 1.25
		local_development_cost = 2.0
		allowed_num_of_buildings = -1
		nation_designer_cost_multiplier = 0.8
		defence = 5
		local_build_time = 0.5			#Try building on ice, on a slope, in -40 degrees, with a polar bear chasing you, in a blizzard...
		local_build_cost = 0.5			#Most expensive terrain to build on. Arctic should stay low dev and weak

		terrain_override = {
			#Unaltered Vanilla

        movement_cost = 1.50
        local_development_cost = 0.10
        allowed_num_of_buildings = 2

        defence = 2
        local_defensiveness = 0.2
        local_build_time = 0.25
        local_build_cost = 0.25
		terrain_override = {
			48
		}

##################################################################
### Graphical terrain
###		type	=	refers to the terrain defined above, "terrain category"'s 
### 	color 	= 	index in bitmap color table (see terrain.bmp)
###

terrain = {
	grasslands			= { type = grasslands		color = { 	0	 } }
	hills				= { type = hills			color = { 	1	 } }
	desert_mountain		= { type = mountain			color = { 	2	 } }
	desert				= { type = desert			color = { 	3	 } }

	plains				= { type = grasslands		color = { 	4	 } }
	terrain_5			= { type = grasslands		color = { 	5	 } }
	mountain			= { type = mountain			color = { 	6	 } }
	desert_mountain_low	= { type = desert			color = { 	7	 } }

	terrain_8			= { type = hills			color = { 	8	 } }
	marsh				= { type = marsh			color = { 	9	 } }
	terrain_10			= { type = farmlands		color = { 	10	 } }
	terrain_11			= { type = farmlands		color = { 	11	 } }

	forest_12			= { type = forest			color = { 	12	 } }
	forest_13			= { type = forest			color = { 	13	 } }
	forest_14			= { type = forest			color = { 	14	 } }
	ocean				= { type = ocean			color = { 	15	 } }

	snow				= { type = mountain 		color = { 	16	 } } # (SPECIAL CASE) Used to identify permanent snow
	inland_ocean_17 	= { type = inland_ocean		color = {	17	 } }

	coastal_desert_18	= { type = coastal_desert	color = { 	19	 } }
	coastline			= { type = coastline		color = { 	35	 } }
	
	savannah			= { type = savannah 		color = {	20	 } }
	drylands			= { type = drylands			color = {	22	 } }
	highlands			= { type = highlands		color = {	23	 } }
	dry_highlands		= { type = highlands		color = {	24	 } }
	
	woods				= { type = woods			color = { 	255	 } }
	jungle				= { type = jungle			color = { 	254	 } }
	
	terrain_21			= { type = farmlands		color = { 	21	 } }	
}

##################################################################
### Tree terrain
###		terrain	=	refers to the terrain tag defined above
### 	color 	= 	index in bitmap color table (see tree.bmp)
###

tree = {
	forest				= { terrain = forest 			color = { 	3 4 6 7 19 20	} }
	woods				= { terrain = woods 			color = { 	2 5 8 18	} }
	jungle				= { terrain = jungle 			color = { 	13 14 15	} }
	palms				= { terrain = desert 			color = { 	12	} }
	savana				= { terrain = grasslands 		color = { 	27 28 29 30	} }
}
